title: The Death of Daydreaming
author: isolli
aiHeadline: In a world where everyone's glued to their screens, daydreaming is officially dead—because who needs imagination when you've got TikTok?

title: Evolving OpenAI's Structure
author: rohitpaulk
aiHeadline: OpenAI is 'evolving' its structure—because clearly, their last one was holding them back from world domination or something.

title: The vocal effects of Daft Punk
author: qzervaas
aiHeadline: Daft Punk's vocal effects are so over-the-top, you'd think they were trying to hide the fact they're actually robots from the future.

title: Judge said Meta illegally used books to build its AI
author: mekpro
aiHeadline: Meta's AI is so advanced, it can now steal books and make you question if it's even legal—because apparently, they're just that good at breaking the rules.

title: Show HN: My AI Native Resume
author: jhgaylor
aiHeadline: AI is now writing resumes so well, you might as well just let it apply for jobs while you take a nap.
